com.geneea.celery.spi

Interface Backend

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RabbitBackend

    public interface Backend
extends Closeable
    Internal, used by Celery and implemented by backend providers.

    Backend, in Celery terminology, is a way to deliver task results back to the client.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Backend.ResultsProvider
      A way to get notified about completion of the tasks.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void reportException(String taskId, String queue, String correlationId, Throwable exception)
      Report erroneous result of computation back to the client.
      void reportResult(String taskId, String queue, String correlationId, Object result)
      Report successful result of computation back to the client.
      Backend.ResultsProvider resultsProviderFor(String clientId)
      The client (Celery) uses this method to subscribe to results of the tasks it sends.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.io.Closeable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • resultsProviderFor

        Backend.ResultsProvider resultsProviderFor(String clientId)
                                    throws IOException
        The client (Celery) uses this method to subscribe to results of the tasks it sends.
        Parameters:
        clientId - your unique client ID
        Returns:
        results provider returning task results
        Throws:
        IOException - signalizes connection problem

      • reportResult

        void reportResult(String taskId,
                  String queue,
                  String correlationId,
                  Object result)
           throws IOException
        Report successful result of computation back to the client.
        Parameters:
        taskId - unique task ID as received
        queue - which queue to report the result to (usually the client ID)
        correlationId - correlation ID as received
        result - the computation result (needs to be JSON serializable)
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of connection problem

      • reportException

        void reportException(String taskId,
                     String queue,
                     String correlationId,
                     Throwable exception)
              throws IOException
        Report erroneous result of computation back to the client.
        Parameters:
        taskId - unique task ID as received
        queue - which queue to report the result to (usually the client ID)
        correlationId - correlation ID as received
        exception - description of the problem
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of connection problem
